Resolution: Run disk cleanup, remove startup programs, update OS, and check for malware using Windows Defender.
Restart router, forget and reconnect to network, update WiFi drivers, and run network troubleshooter.
Restart printer spooler service, reinstall printer drivers, ensure printer is online, and clear print queue.
Reconfigure email account, check server settings, ensure stable internet, and clear email cache.
Review stop code, update drivers, run memory diagnostic, and check recent hardware changes.
Run installer as admin, clear temp files, ensure enough disk space, and disable antivirus temporarily.
Reconnect keyboard, check batteries (if wireless), update drivers, and test with another USB port.
Replace batteries, clean sensor, update drivers, and reduce pointer speed in settings.
Verify credentials, restart VPN service, switch servers, and check firewall blocking.
Force close app, clear app cache, update software, and check RAM usage.
Verify network path, check permissions, ensure both devices are on same network.
Update router firmware, change WiFi channel, move closer to router, and reduce interference.
Clear DNS cache, try different browser, check firewall, and verify site is not blocked.
Use wired connection, close background tasks, check disk health, and disable large file scanning.
Check audio output device, update drivers, restart audio service, and test with headphones.
Update GPU drivers, adjust resolution in settings, and check monitor cable.
Test mic/cam, allow browser permissions, restart meeting app, and check bandwidth.
Use self-service password reset, wait for timeout period, or contact admin to unlock.
Check password policy, ensure caps lock is off, and reset via admin portal.
Press Ctrl+Shift+Esc, end unresponsive tasks, restart PC, and check for thermal issues.
Clean cooling vents, reduce workload, check fan status, and repaste CPU if needed.
Check adapter, test another charger, update BIOS, and inspect charging port.
Restart update service, delete software distribution folder, and retry update.
Clear browsing data, disable extensions, update browser, and reset settings.
Use file recovery tool, restore from backup, or run chkdsk to repair disk errors.
Reconnect via File Explorer, remap drive, and ensure VPN is connected.
Check VPN, verify user permissions, update certificates, and try alternate browser.
Reinstall sync app, reset account permissions, and check cloud storage status.
Restart printer, reconnect to WiFi, reinstall printer, and disable offline mode.

Issue: System running out of disk space
Resolution: Uninstall unused apps, clean temp files, move files to cloud or external drive.
Update GPU drivers, disable adaptive brightness, and check loose display cable.
Check power cable, test with another outlet, reset power supply, and remove peripherals.
Try different USB port, update drivers, enable USB legacy support in BIOS.
Run as admin, reinstall application, clear configuration files.
Enable remote access, check firewall, ensure PC is online and reachable.
Disable startup programs, enable fast startup, and check disk health.
Disable background apps, reduce brightness, update drivers, and check battery health.
Sync time automatically, check time zone settings, and restart time service.
Check permissions, verify storage availability, and disable file protection apps.
Identify heavy processes, update software, scan for malware, and optimize startup.
Close background apps, increase virtual memory, and scan system for issues.
Rebuild icon cache, delete duplicate shortcuts, and refresh desktop.
Test speed, reboot router, switch Ethernet, and check for bandwidth hogging apps.
Reconnect HDMI/DP cable, update GPU drivers, and detect display via settings.
Rebuild search index, repair Office installation, and clear OST file.
Reset OneDrive, re-sign in, and ensure file path compatibility.
Check Teams permissions, reinstall audio drivers, and test in device settings.
Check AD group membership, update role assignment, and sync directory.
Lower display resolution, disable visual effects, and switch to wired connection.
